about_the_game:
Overview


Touhou Fractured Transience is a 2D Platform Fighter game with elements of the Shoot'em up genre. Play as one of the many legendary figures of Gensokyo and wield their powers and abilities in combat. Hit your opponent as hard as possible and send them flying in a beautiful yet unhinged Battle of Bullets!

Story

Gensokyo is suddenly hit by weird boundary irregularities! Various mysterious bubbles have started to surround various parts of Gensokyo, and it seems to be expanding little by little as time passes. Those who enter the barrier is given an indestructible and never aging body that rivals even a Hermit. However, due to it giving what's practically immortality to also humans, humans may never have to fear youkai. Before these barriers consume the entirety of Gensokyo and endanger the balance between Humans and Youkai, our heroines must find a way to destroy it somehow.

However, it seems that the break for this phenomenon is rather straight forward: Abuse the power of immortality to the boundary's limits and shatter it with the same unshattering bodies it gives to its inhabitants. In other words, a battle with no restraints! To solve this disruptive incident, Danmaku battles are completely unhinged and fighters are allowed to use even their most powerful attacks!

Danmaku and Grazing


In Gensokyo, Bullets are a means of communication to resolve conflict. Every Fighter is equipped with some form of projectiles. As such, interactions such as approaching, controlling space and pursuing is typically dominated by bullets.

However, just as important is dodging these bullets. Whenever a fighter grazes any attack, their Spell meter fills up. With Spell meter, Fighters gain access to their strong attacks. If completely filled however, fighters can unleash a Spellcard!

Spellcard System


Each fighter has 3 sets of Spellcards each with its own properties and functions. They are powerful attacks that can change the tide of battle in an instant! Before unleashing a spellcard however, one must make sure to declare one before unleashing it, to ensure the other fighter is ready for it.

After awhile, your spellcard is ready to fire anytime. Be sure to aim at someone you don't like...

And unleash your annihilation of love!

Ability Cards


Ability cards makes a return with effects much more convincing than its previous appearance! Summon the various powers of familiar faces across Gensokyo to aid you in your quest for victory!

Other Planned Features

  • Rollback-Network Planned
  • 7 Playable Fighters
More to be announced in the future...

name: Touhou Fractured Transience

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 and above
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce MX350
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: A 2D Platform Fighter with elements of the Shoot'em up genre. Wield the powers and abilities of characters from Touhou, hit your opponent as hard as possible and send them flying in a beautiful yet unhinged Battle of Bullets!
